title: Crystal structure, spectroscopy, DFT, and thermal studies of 3-cyano-2(1H)-pyridones as potential anticancer agents
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24928-24941
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04563G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Diana Hurtado-Rodríguez, Diana Becerra, Hugo Rojas, Jovanny A. Gómez Castaño, Mario A. Macías, Juan-Carlos Castillo
3-Cyano-2(1H)-pyridones 4a–c were synthesized in good yields using a microwave-assisted multicomponent approach. Additionally, their crystal structures, spectroscopy, DFT, thermal, and anticancer studies were investigated.
